title: Need help
body: So late last night I had a very big Windows update (windows anniversary update i think) it took 2 hours to do that and I woke up had a game and had FPS drops through the whole game. My graphics card and everything was all good before this update however I thought it was the graphics card so I did the latest update on my graphics card and it said on it windows anniversary and still the same issue with the fps. Does anyone know what is going on or is experiencing the same thing? I would like this fixed ASAP if anyone would like to help me out thanks.

replies.body:
Hey there,

That sounds odd to me, have you taken another look since to see if there are any other updates available for your GPU drivers?
Yeah went on the latest one and still no change. I am positive it was the update slowing down my computer
Have you attempted to roll back this update?
I don't now how to, do I just select go back to previous build? And if I do go back won't it just download it again after I check for updates?
